I

isAttackedSquare(int, int, String) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Checks to see if any piece of team color can attack the square designated by parameters row and col.
isLegalBishopMove(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Returns true if the number of columns moved is equal to the number of rows moved
isLegalKingMove(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Returns true if the piece moves less than 2 squares in any direction
isLegalKnightMove(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Returns true if move was in an "L"
isLegalMoveStyle(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Delegates to the appropriate method to check if the style of move matches the piece being moved.
isLegalPawnMove(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Returns true if piece moved one or two squares forward, captured one square diagonally, or captured via en passent
isLegalQueenMove(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Returns true if piece moved along a column or row, or if the change in row number is equal to the change in column number
isLegalRookMove(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Returns true if move was along a column or along a row.
isNotSameSquare(Move) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Returns true if the start square is different than the end square, false otherwise
isNotSelfCapture(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Returns true if the color of the piece on the end square differs from that of the start square.
isNotSelfCheck(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Simulates the move in question, and checks to see if the moving player would be in check afterwards.
isUnblocked(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Delegates to the appropriate handler to verify the that path of the piece in the move parameter is not blocked.
isUnblockedBishopPath(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Returns true if there are no pieces on the diagonal from the start square in argument move to the end square in the argument move.
isUnblockedKingPath(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Returns true.
isUnblockedKnightPath(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Returns true.
isUnblockedPawnPath(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Returns true if the initial movement of a pawn is two squares and is blocked.
isUnblockedQueenPath(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Returns true if there is an unobstructed path from the queen to her destination square, false otherwise.
isUnblockedRookPath(Move, BoardController) - Static method in class controller.RuleEngine
Returns true if there are no pieces on squares between the start and end squares of the move parameter, assuming movement along a column or row.
